statements: SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM unauthorized_access_attempts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS attempts FROM unauthorized_access_attempts GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY location;
SELECT id, device_id, location, timestamp FROM unauthorized_access_attempts ORDER BY device_id, timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, timestamp, location FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, timestamp FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE location = 'Office' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, timestamp, location FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-31' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT device_id, location FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE device_id IN (456, 789) AND location LIKE '%Lab%' ORDER BY device_id ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE location = 'Server Room' AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE owner_id = 123;
SELECT access_id, access_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE device_id = 456 AND access_type = 'login';
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE access_type = 'alert' ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT device_name, owner_id FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY owner_id, device_name;
SELECT access_id, device_id, access_time, access_type FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE access_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name LIKE 'Living Room %';
SELECT access_id, access_time, access_type, device_name FROM unauthorized_access_attempts JOIN smart_home_devices ON unauthorized_access_attempts.device_id = smart_home_devices.device_id;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, device_id, user_id FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE device_id = 5;
SELECT device_name, device_type, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE owner_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE status = 'failed' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS attempts_count FROM unauthorized_access_attempts GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(id) > 3;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'camera' AND owner_id = 123 ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, s.device_name FROM users u JOIN smart_home_devices s ON u.id = s.owner_id WHERE u.role = 'admin' ORDER BY u.username ASC;

SELECT u.username, s.device_type, a.timestamp FROM users u JOIN smart_home_devices s ON u.id = s.owner_id JOIN unauthorized_access_attempts a ON s.id = a.device_id WHERE a.status = 'failed' ORDER BY a.timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts;
SELECT device_id, access_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE access_type = 'Unauthorized';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) FROM unauthorized_access_attempts GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM unauthorized_access_attempts ORDER BY access_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT device_id, access_time FROM unauthorized_access_attempts WHERE device_id = 101 ORDER BY access_time ASC;
SELECT device_id, COUNT(*) AS total_attempts FROM unauthorized_access_attempts GROUP BY device_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT u.username, d.device_name, a.access_time FROM users u JOIN access_logs a ON u.id = a.user_id JOIN smart_home_devices d ON d.id = a.device_id;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs, SUM(CASE WHEN access_result = 'success' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successful_logs, SUM(CASE WHEN access_result = 'failed' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS failed_logs FROM access_logs;
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type = 'Lamp';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location LIKE '%Living Room%';
SELECT device_id, device_type FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type IN ('Thermostat', 'Smart Lock');
SELECT * FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_type='smart thermostat';
SELECT device_id, device_name, location FROM smart_home_devices WHERE location='Living Room';
SELECT CONCAT(device_name, ' - ', device_type) AS device_info FROM smart_home_devices;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE role='admin';
